excellence.label: Artisanal excellence
excellence.title:
EVERY DETAIL
IS A SIGNATURE.
excellence.subtitle: Created in Paris, crafted for eternity.
excellence.description: Our frames are the result of craftsmanship passed down through generations. Each piece is a work of art, designed to enhance your gaze.

fabrication.label: Craftsmanship
fabrication.title:
THE ART OF
DETAIL
fabrication.subtitle: From the workshop to your gaze.
fabrication.step1Desc: Each acetate plate is selected for its unique veining.
fabrication.step2Desc: 48 hours of polishing for an incomparable shine.
fabrication.step3Desc: Each hinge is hand-adjusted with watchmaking precision.

histoire.label: Our story
histoire.title: RENAISSANCE
histoire.subtitle: Paris, since always.
histoire.description: Five millennial symbols. Exceptional artisanal craftsmanship. Eyewear designed to last and be passed down.

tryInStore.label: In-store fitting
tryInStore.title:
TRY AT YOUR
OPTICIAN
tryInStore.subtitle: The Renaissance experience near you.
tryInStore.description: More than 200 partner opticians in France. Find the nearest one and try our collections.

seo.title: Artisanal Luxury Eyewear
seo.description: Discover RENAISSANCE Paris, a French luxury eyewear house. Exceptional artisanal craftsmanship, noble materials and timeless design. Created in Paris with passion.
